mapper.insert:
insert into T_WORKER_ORDER(
WORKER_ORDER_NO,
TYPE, START_PARK_NO, START_PARK_NAME, TERMINAL_PARK_NO, TERMINAL_PARK_NAME, CAR_NO, CAR_PLATE_NO, WORKER_ID, WORKER_NAME, SEND_TIME, START_TIME, FINISH_TIME, CENCOR_STATUS, CENCOR_MEMO, CENCOR_TIME, CENCOR_ID, WORK_ORDER_STATUS, MEMO, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, OPERATOR_TYPE, OPERATOR_ID, SEND_REASON, SEND_REASON_PIC_URL1, SEND_REASON_PIC_URL2, SEND_REASON_PIC_URL3, PLAN_TIME, ASSIGN_WORKER_ID, ASSIGN_WORKER_NAME, ASSIGN_TIME, POWER, OPEN_CAR_DOOR_TIME, END_LONGITUDE, END_LATITUDE, CURRENT_ADDRESS, CURRENT_LONGITUDE, CURRENT_LATITUDE ) values (
#{workerOrderNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{startParkNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{startParkName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{terminalParkNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{terminalParkName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{carNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{carPlateNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{workerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{workerName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{finishTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{cencorStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{cencorMemo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{cencorTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{cencorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{workOrderStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{memo,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{operatorType,jdbcType = TINYINT}, #{operatorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sendReason,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sendReasonPicUrl1,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sendReasonPicUrl2,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{sendReasonPicUrl3,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{planTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{assignWorkerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{assignWorkerName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{assignTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{power,jdbcType = DOUBLE}, #{openCarDoorTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP}, #{endLongitude,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{endLatitude,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{currentAddress,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{currentLongitude,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{currentLatitude,jdbcType = VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
update t_worker_order
TYPE=#{type,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
START_PARK_NO=#{startParkNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
START_PARK_NAME=#{startParkName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_WORKER_ID=#{assignWorkerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
ASSIGN_WORKER_NAME=#{assignWorkerName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
TERMINAL_PARK_NO=#{terminalParkNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
TERMINAL_PARK_NAME=#{terminalParkName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CAR_NO=#{carNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CAR_PLATE_NO=#{carPlateNo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
END_LONGITUDE=#{endLongitude,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
END_LATITUDE=#{endLatitude,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
WORKER_ID=#{workerId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
WORKER_NAME=#{workerName,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
SEND_TIME=#{sendTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
PLAN_TIME=#{planTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
ASSIGN_TIME=#{assignTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
OPEN_CAR_DOOR_TIME=#{openCarDoorTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
POWER=#{power,jdbcType = DOUBLE},
START_TIME=#{startTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
FINISH_TIME=#{finishTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
CENCOR_STATUS=#{cencorStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT},
CENCOR_MEMO=#{cencorMemo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CENCOR_TIME=#{cencorTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
CENCOR_ID=#{cencorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
WORK_ORDER_STATUS=#{workOrderStatus,jdbcType = TINYINT},
MEMO=#{memo,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME=#{createTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME=#{updateTime,jdbcType = TIMESTAMP},
OPERATOR_TYPE=#{operatorType,jdbcType = TINYINT},
OPERATOR_ID=#{operatorId,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
SEND_REASON=#{sendReason,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
SEND_REASON_PIC_URL1=#{sendReasonPicUrl1,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
SEND_REASON_PIC_URL2=#{sendReasonPicUrl2,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
SEND_REASON_PIC_URL3=#{sendReasonPicUrl3,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CURRENT_ADDRESS=#{currentAddress,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CURRENT_LONGITUDE=#{currentLongitude,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
CURRENT_LATITUDE=#{currentLatitude,jdbcType = VARCHAR},
AND WORKER_ORDER_NO=#{workerOrderNo}
mapper.select:
select
from t_worker_order
CAR_NO=#{0} and WORK_ORDER_STATUS=2
order by CREATE_TIME desc limit 1

SELECT o.WORKER_ORDER_NO AS workerOrderNo, c.CAR_PLATE_NO AS carPlateNo, c.CAR_NO AS carNo, o.TYPE AS type, o.CURRENT_ADDRESS AS currentAddress, o.CURRENT_LONGITUDE AS currentLongitude, o.CURRENT_LATITUDE As currentLatitude, o.WORK_ORDER_STATUS AS workOrderStatus, s.POWER AS power, s.RANGE_MILEAGE AS rangeMileage, c.CAR_BRAND_NAME AS carBrandName, c.CAR_MODEL_NAME AS carModelName, c.ONLINE_STATUS AS onlineStatus, p.ADDR_STREET AS parkName, p.ADDR_STREET AS addrStreet, c.CAR_PHOTO_URL1 AS carPhotoUrl1, 12756274*asin(Sqrt(power(sin((#{1}-s.LATITUDE)*0.008726646),2)+Cos(#{1}*0.0174533)*Cos(s.LATITUDE*0.0174533)*power(sin((#{0}-s.LONGITUDE)*0.008726646),2))) AS distance, o.SEND_TIME AS sendTime, o.PLAN_TIME AS planTime, o.FINISH_TIME AS finishTime, o.TERMINAL_PARK_NAME AS terminalParkName, o.MEMO AS memo, d.DEVICE_SN AS deviceSn, d.MAC_ADDR AS macAddr, d.TERMINAL_DEVICE_NO AS terminalDeviceNo, s.LONGITUDE AS longitude, s.LATITUDE AS latitude, o.END_LONGITUDE AS endLongitude, o.END_LATITUDE AS endLatitude, o.START_PARK_NAME AS startParkName, o.WORKER_ID AS workerNo FROM t_worker_order o LEFT JOIN t_car c ON o.CAR_NO = c.CAR_NO LEFT JOIN t_car_status s ON o.CAR_NO = s.CAR_NO LEFT JOIN t_park p ON p.PARK_NO = s.LOCATION_PARK_NO LEFT JOIN t_device d ON o.CAR_NO = d.CAR_NO
o.WORKER_ORDER_NO = #{2}
select count(WORKER_ORDER_NO) from t_worker_order

select count(WORKER_ORDER_NO) from t_worker_order
AND WORK_ORDER_STATUS=2

select count(WORKER_ORDER_NO) from t_worker_order
CAR_NO=#{0} and WORK_ORDER_STATUS=1

select
from t_worker_order
WORKER_ID=#{0} and CENCOR_STATUS=1 and WORK_ORDER_STATUS=#{1}
order by SEND_TIME desc

select
from t_worker_order
WORKER_ID=#{0} and CENCOR_STATUS=1 and WORK_ORDER_STATUS = 2

select
from t_worker_order
WORKER_ID=#{0} and CAR_NO=#{1} and CENCOR_STATUS=1 and WORK_ORDER_STATUS = 2
mapper.update: update t_worker_order t set t.OPEN_CAR_DOOR_TIME=(case when t.OPEN_CAR_DOOR_TIME is null then #{1} else t.OPEN_CAR_DOOR_TIME end),t.UPDATE_TIME=#{1} where t.CAR_NO=#{0} and t.WORK_ORDER_STATUS=2
mapper.select:
select
from t_worker_order
select count(WORKER_ORDER_NO) from t_worker_order

select
from t_worker_order
CAR_NO=#{0} order by send_time desc limit 1
SELECT count(*) FROM t_worker_order WHERE CENCOR_STATUS=0

select
from t_worker_order
CAR_NO=#{carNo} and WORK_ORDER_STATUS in(3,4) order by CREATE_TIME desc limit 1

select
from t_worker_order
CAR_NO=#{0} and WORK_ORDER_STATUS=1
select sum(case when WORK_ORDER_STATUS=1 then 1 else 0 end) as waitWorkerOrderNum, sum(case when WORK_ORDER_STATUS=2 then 1 else 0 end) as doingWorkerOrderNum from t_worker_order
